name: The Tower of Reality
description:
Puzzle platformer where you have a magical lantern that shows hidden objects around you. Are the hidden objects real? That is the question.

Is your typical game jam game riddled with bugs, with many features cut and put together with glue and tape, but hey, we finished!

NOTE: No Mac and Linux support until jam voting is over. We already have some major improvements & a softlock fix + Max/Linux/WebGL builds. We've also added crouching and a dedicated pause menu. Stay tuned for these changes!

Controls:

Keyboard only for now

  • Movement: WASD/Arrow keys
  • Jump: W/Up arrow
  • Toggle Lantern: E
  • Pause/Map: Escape/P

Made by:

  • Chris is Awesome (GitHub, Twitter, Twitch) - Lantern code, Design, Unity wizard, Wyrm's coding "guru"
  • GameWyrm (Twitch) - Art, Design, General Coding, Unity wizard
  • MelonSpeedruns (Twitter) - Player code, Design

Made in Unity 2021.1.1f1

Was the third jam GameWyrm and I participated in, but first time completing a game, and first time working with MelonSpeedruns!

Tried to build to WebGL but Unity was having a bad day so it didn't want to build to that. Unity is bad.
